The claim was verified by conducting a r: which led to a Facebook post by the Tamil Nadu police in 2017. The post confirmed that a police inspector named Akilan was attacked at Marina beach, but there was no mention of Muslim men abusing women under the influence of cannabis.
A keyword search led to a report publish: which stated that the attack on the police constable at Marina beach was due to two men consuming liquor, not because of abusing women or being under the influence of cannabis. The report also mentioned that the accused individuals were named Hari Ram and Dinesh, with no indication of them being Muslim.
The expert: s verdict also mentioned that the claim was shared by a Twitter user named 'Raji Hindustani' and subsequently picked up on Facebook. This information adds to the context of how the claim spread on social media platforms.
